name: Transponder
desc: Broadcast your identity, required for legal trade.

name: Go Dark
desc: Reduce sensor profile at the cost of burn level.

name: Active Sensor Burst
desc: Stop and increase detection range, fleet is more detectable.

name: Emergency Burn
desc: Briefly boost burn level at the cost of fuel and combat readiness.

name: Sustained Burn
desc: Boost burn level at the cost of acceleration and wind-up time.

name: Interdiction Pulse
desc: Slow down another fleet heading towards the source of the pulse.

name: Scavenge
desc: Pick through a debris field for anything of value.

name: Neutrino Detector
desc: Detect in-system entities at very long range, unreliable with false readings.

name: Transverse Jump
desc: Jump into a system through a nascent gravity well, or directly into hyperspace.

name: Remote Survey
desc: Do a preliminary survey on all nearby planets remotely.
